pageTitle: Stock Quote SPG Simon Property Group Inc.
textBeforeTable: Simon Property Group, Inc. is an equity real estate investment trust. The firm invests in the real estate markets across the globe. It engages in investment, ownership, management, and development of properties. It primarily invests in regional malls, premium outlets, mills, and community/lifestyle centers to create its portfolio. Simon Property Group, Inc. was founded in 1960 and is based in Indianapolis, Indiana, with additional office in New York, New York. } } }); style: { link_color: '4871a8', link_hover_color: '4871a8', header_text_color: '000000', border_color: 'transparent', border_color_2: 'transparent', divider_color: 'd3d3d3', divider_type: 'solid', box_color: 'transparent', stream_color: 'transparent', text_color: '000000', time_color: '999999', font: 'Verdana, Arial, Tahoma', font_size: 11, time_font_size: 10, username_font: 'Verdana, Arial, Tahoma', username_size: 11 } streaming: 'true', header: 0, scrollbars: 0, limit: '15', height: height, width: '300', symbol: quoteTicker, container: 'stocktwits-widget-news', STWT.Widget({ var height = document.getElementById('news-table').clientHeight - (FinvizSettings.hasUserPremium ? 0 : 250) var quoteTicker = 'SPG'; if(typeof STWT !== 'undefined') { function StocktwitsInit() { Swire Properties, Whitman Family Development and Simon Property Group Announce Partnership at noodls 06:37AM   Interim report First quarter of 2015 at noodls 09:28AM   Exclusive: See what this Galleria restaurant will look
